tool_description: The Bulk SMS Sender API empowers developers and businesses to efficiently send SMS messages in bulk to multiple recipients. This API is designed for backend applications and integrates seamlessly with Twilio, a leading SMS messaging platform, to ensure reliable and secure message delivery.
name: BulkSMSSender
title: BulkSMSSender

api_list.name: Send
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bulksmssender.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulksmssender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bulksmssender.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulksmssender.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
